questions.text: If I experience any thoughts or have plans to hurt myself I will
options: Remove my access to any weapons/pills or anything else that I could use to hurt myself
Call my doctor and ask for an urgent appointment
If these thoughts or intentions are very strong I will attend the nearest emergency department

questions.text: Things I can do that can help me through this time
options: I want to see my children grow up
I don't want to hurt my family or friends by leaving them
There are things I would like to do in the future
I have responsibilities to my family and friends
People will see me as weak
There are always other options to suicide
It is against what my religion teaches
Life is precious
It would badly affect my family and friends

questions.text: Other things I can do that can help me through this time
Do things to distract my thoughts and that I have found nice to do in the past:
options: Spend time with people I love
Doing things which I find relaxing and calming
Listen to gentle music

questions.text: Use the thinking and problem solving tools:
options: Challenge negative thinking
Use problem solving steps so difficulties do not seem so overwhelming

sectionTitle: I can get support at this time from:
What I would like my support people to do:

questions.text: Things that you would like your service provider (doctor/therapist) to do:
options: See me at short notice for an urgent appointment
Review and make necessary changes to my medications
Arrange admission to hospital if needed
Help me to work on changing my suicidal thoughts
See me more frequently until I am feeling better

questions.text: Things that people (friends and family) in your support network can do:
options: Sit with me until I feel safe
Listen to me and tell me things that could help comfort me
Do not blame, criticize or minimize my feelings or concerns
Help me to do some pleasant things to distract me
Help me with some of the household tasks and other responsibilities that are too difficult for me at this time (childcare, dishes, vacuum, feeding pets, grocery shopping, washing)

questions.text: Help me to organise my appointment with a service provider by:
options: Making the call on my behalf
Driving me to the appointment
Coming in with me to the consultation
Taking me to the pharmacy
Drive me to hospital and stay with me while I am admitted
Agree to take my weapons/pills or anything else they think may be potentially lethal until these feelings pass

questions.text: Other things that could help me at this time:

sectionTitle: When you have completed your Suicide Risk Prevention Contract print it off and sign it and ask all those involved in the plan to sign it too
